PROJECT(se05x_I2cMaster)

FILE(
    GLOB
    ${PROJECT_NAME}_files
    se05x_I2cMaster.c
    *.h
)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(${PROJECT_NAME} ${KSDK_STARTUP_FILE} ${${PROJECT_NAME}_files})

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${PROJECT_NAME} ex_common)

CREATE_BINARY(${PROJECT_NAME})

PROJECT(se05x_I2cMasterWithAttestation)

FILE(
    GLOB
    ${PROJECT_NAME}_files
    se05x_I2cMasterWithAttestation.c
    *.h
)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(${PROJECT_NAME} ${KSDK_STARTUP_FILE} ${${PROJECT_NAME}_files})

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${PROJECT_NAME} ex_common)

CREATE_BINARY(${PROJECT_NAME})
